snippet: Italy striker Graziano Pelle scored on his debut to earn a 1-0 away win over 10-man Malta with the visitors having hit the woodwork four times in their Euro 2016 qualifier on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Debutant Pelle Hands Italy Win Over 10-Man Malta
headline.main: Debutant Pelle Hands Italy Win Over 10-Man Malta

lead_paragraph: Italy striker Graziano Pelle scored on his debut to earn a 1-0 away win over 10-man Malta with the visitors having hit the woodwork four times in their Euro 2016 qualifier on Monday.
